content: **knitted jumper for dog in drops fiesta piece is knitted from the neck to tail in stocking stitch and rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #floralpicnicdogsweater drops design pattern fs-042 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m measurements back length approx 24-32-40 cm measured along the back without neck edge fits chest measurements approx 28/32-38/42-48/52 cm example of dog breeds xs = chihuahua s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 29 garden party **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used- you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
